title: Alaska Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Alaska Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
gin
1/2
ounce
Yellow Chartreuse
1
dash
orange bitters
(optional)
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well for 20 seconds and strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Special equipment
Mixing glass, cocktail strainer
Gin
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
